title: SnackBar12
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering
description: Serves quick food like sandwiches, salads, vegan hot dogs and smoothies. Has coffee with soy, rice, almond or oat milk. Serves 3 weekly changing warm dishes and one soup, cakes and tarts. Daily breakfast until noon, and on Saturdays until 3pm. Variety of vegan chocolate bars and other snacks. Hosts events and cooking classes. Located on a little market square, 20-minute walk from the city center. Now 100% vegan, Nov 2015.
